scripts.first:publishing: npm run build && npm org set isagro && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:patch: git add . && git commit -m "patch" && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: git add . && git commit -m "minor" && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: git add . && git commit -m "major" && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish --access public
